title: No premium shall be charged for fungible compensatory area and for features covered under the provision of Regulation No 31(1) for the development for AH/R&R tenements
clause_text: No premium shall be charged for fungible compensatory area and for features covered under the provision of Regulation No 31(1) for the development for AH/R&R tenements.

source_pdf.text_snippet: No premium shall be charged for fungible compensatory area and for features covered under the provision of Regulation No 31(1) for the development for AH/R&R tenements.
